title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Science Instructional Design for Strengthening Online Self-Regulated Learning Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Interpret learning analytics data to design self-regulated learning strategies
Identify three or more LMS design elements that facilitate cognitive processing in science curriculum content
Propose personalized feedback mechanisms reflecting learning behavior analytics (playback, rewinding, skipping, etc.)
Produce science lesson design documents applying self-regulated learning support strategies through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
